name: @musicbot-web/server
description: A web client for the MusicBot project (https://github.com/BjoernPetersen/MusicBot)

scripts.setVersion: sed -i -e "s/{{version}}/$(cat ../../package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F= "{ print $2 }" | sed -E 's/(version)|[:,\",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]')/g" index.js

author: Felix Gail
